title: elboshyx
author: elboshyx
content: Hi there,I'm searching for someone in Europe who can provide me with KYC ( verification ) services for my Neosurf account, enabling me to enjoy premium features. I'd feel more comfortable using an escrow service or paying after the services are rendered. Thank you in advance.TG : @Elboshyx

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: You want someone to verify an account for you using their identity?
